A litell dialogue off [sic] the Consolator cõfortynge the Churche in hyr afflictions, taken out off [sic] the 129. psalme. / Composed in frẽche by M. Peter du Val. ; And translated into Englyshe by Robart Pownoll. Anno 1556 Mẽs Junij.. DuVal, P. (Pierre) Pownall, Robert, 1520-1571.
[72] p.
J. Lambrecht?], [Wesel? : Anno .1556. Mens .Junij .14..
Contains marginal notes. Imprint information from STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A-D⁸ E⁴. Imperfect: last leaf torn, with loss of text. Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society.
